Hi! I'm Steven Turnbull, a data scientist with a wide range of interests. 
I use this site to post about random things that I find interesting!

### Some Things I Have Worked On
- [PhD Thesis in Education](https://researchspace.auckland.ac.nz/handle/2292/54611)
- [COVID-19 Network Modelling](https://www.pmscienceprizes.org.nz/2020-prime-ministers-science-prize-winner/)
- [Network and Geospatial Analysis](https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC8733170/)
- [Data Visualisation](https://github.com/sturbull/tidytuesday)
- Data Infrastructure (ETL/ELT Pipelines, Dashboarding)
